summary: Adamantium Dragon Rapier of Breton craftsmanship. Rumoured to have been forged for the King of Daggerfall it is unknown how it came to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
What is this mod?

Adds a unique Rapier to the game. Built from scratch custom meshes and high rez textures. Unique scabbard

You can find it in the study on the right as you enter the Jarl's private upper quarters in Dragonreach. You'll have to steal it.

===========================================================================================

Adamantium Dragon Rapier of Breton craftsmanship. Rumoured to have been forged for the King of Daggerfall it is unknown how it came to Skyrim.
The Dragon Rapier is of forge magic’s and materials long lost to Tamriel, it may not be crafted or improved.

Equivalent stats to an ebony sword but fast as a dagger and with longer reach. Lighter and available early in game.

http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Adamantium

If you just want to try it out you can console it in with...

Player.additem XX 000D72 X or “help rapier 4”

INSTALLATION

Click the Download with Manager button in the files section to download to NMM.
Activate the mod in NMM.

To manually install, just download the fileand extract the files into the data folder. Don't forget to activate the .esp ;)
author: Kettlewitch
